verses.roman:
sahāya karena tāṅra la-iyā 'pradhāna'
koṭi brahmāṇḍa karena icchāya nirmāṇa

synonyms: sahāya karena—He helps; tāṅra—His; lā-iyā—with; pradhāna—the material energy; koṭi-brahmāṇḍa—millions of universes; karena—does; icchāya—only by the will; nirmāṇa—creation.
translation: He [Advaita Ācārya] helps in the pastimes of the puruṣa, with whose material energy and by whose will He creates innumerable universes.
